meanings.definition: A genus of viruses in the family Flaviviridae, including the Zika virus and dengue virus.
meanings.sent1: The flavivirus caused a fever in the patient.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how the flavivirus spreads among mosquitoes.
meanings.sent3: The flavivirus decided to take a vacation in the tropics.
meanings.sent4: The flavivirus spread through the community like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The flavivirus danced its way through the bloodstream, infecting cells along the path.
